channel.title: Baker-Copperfield Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Baker-Copperfield Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-86 East at Brownlee-Oxbow Highway
item.description: OR-86 East at Brownlee-Oxbow Highway. Turn right on Brownlee-Oxbow Highway to Oxbow Dam, Brownlee Dam, and Cambridge (Idaho). Continue east on OR-86 for Homestead and Hells Canyon Dam.

item.title: End Brownlee-Oxbow Highway at OR-86
item.description: End Brownlee-Oxbow Highway at OR-86. Use OR-86 west to Baker City, Halfway, and Pine Creek. Use OR-86 east to Homestead and Hells Canyon Dam. OR-86 ends a short distance to the east at the Snake River.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 304 Offramp at OR-7
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 304 offramp at OR-7 in Baker City. Turn left on OR-7 west to Sumpter.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-7 - Baker City
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn right for US-30 East/OR-7 South to Ontario and John Day. Turn left for OR-7 west to Richland and Hells Canyon (via OR-86).

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-7
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-7. Use left lane for Richland and Halfway. Both of these communities are along OR-86 between Baker City and Hells Canyon.

item.title: OR-86 East at West Airport Road (Medical Springs Highway)
item.description: OR-86 east West Airport Road (Medical Springs Highway) to the (Baker City) Airport and Medical Springs (via OR-203). Continue east on OR-86 for Richland, OR, Halfway and Hells Canyon. West Airport Road is a Frontage Road that extends south from the junction of OR-203 to OR-86. It is part of the Oregon State Highway system as the Medical Springs Highway but is not signed with a number.

item.title: End OR-7 East Approaching I-84 West
item.description: End OR-7 East approaching I-84 West to Richland (via OR-86), Hells Canyon (via OR-86) and La Grande.

item.title: End OR-7 East at I-84 East
item.description: End OR-7 East at I-84 East. Turn right for I-84 east to Ontario; straight for I-84 west to La Grande and (Oregon Trail) Interpretive Center.

item.title: End OR-86 West at I-84
item.description: End OR-86 at I-84 (Exit 302). Use I-84 west for La Grande. Use I-84 east for Baker City and Ontario.

item.title: OR-86 West at I-84
item.description: OR-86 west at OR-203 (not signed) to Medical Springs and Airport.

item.title: OR-86 West - New Bridge Jct.
item.description: OR-86 west at New Bridge Road to New Bridge and Sparta. Continue west on OR-86 for Baker City.

item.title: OR-86 West at OR-86 Spur (Unsigned)
item.description: OR-86 West at OR-86 Spur (Unsigned) into Halfway, Oregon. Continue west on OR-86 for Baker City.

item.title: OR-86 West at OR-414
item.description: OR-86 west at OR-414 (unsigned). Use OR-414 west for Halfway; continue west on OR-86 for Baker City and Richland.

item.title: OR-86 West Approaching Halfway Jct.
item.description: OR-86 West approaching Halfway Jct (OR-414). OR-414 is unsigned.

item.title: OR-86 West NFH-39 Jct.
item.description: OR-86 west approaching NFH-39 north to Imnaha and Joseph.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-7 East Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn left for US-30 west to North Baker Business District, Haines, and Anthony Lakes. Continue straight for OR-7 east, to I-84, Richland, and La Grande.

item.title: End NFH-39 OR-86 Jct.
item.description: End NFH-39 south at OR-86 to Oxbow and Halfway.

item.title: OR-86 West NFH-39 Jct.
item.description: OR-86 west approaching NFH-39, Imnaha/Joseph.

item.title: Pacific Time Zone OR-86
item.description: Entering Pacific Time Zone on OR-86 west.

item.title: Hells Canyon Scenic Byway OR-86
item.description: Hells Canyon Scenic Byway on OR-86 west.

item.title: OR-86 at Idaho Power Road
item.description: OR-86 west at Idaho Power Road north to Homestead, Hells Canyon Trail, and Oxbow P.O.

item.title: Welcome To Oregon - OR-86
item.description: Welcome to Oregon at the Snake River on OR-86. The Entering Adams County sign is deceptive, we are actually leaving Adams County (ID) and entering Baker County (OR).

item.title: End Brownlee-Oxbow Hwy. at OR-86
item.description: End Brownlee-Oxbow Highway at OR-86 to Homestead and Baker City.

item.title: OR-86 West at I-84
item.description: OR-86 west at OR-203 (not signed) to Medical Springs and Airport.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 302
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 302, OR-82 East/Richland/Hells Canyon.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 302
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 302, OR-86 East/Richland/Hells Canyon, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 304
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 304, OR-7 South/Geiser Grand Hotel/Baker City Center Historic District.
